com.ooyala.android

Class StateNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.StateNotifier

  • public class StateNotifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Connect State changing objects with listeners thereof. There are two kinds of listeners: (1) OoyalaPlayer, which is updated via notifyPluginStateChange. (2) StateNotifierListener, which is updated via onStateChange.
